title: Closing Ceremonies: Devcon Decade 0
description:
The closing ceremonies will feature the "Devcon Decade 0" discussion, with:
• Aya Miyaguchi from the Ethereum Foundation
• Justin Glibert and gubsheep from 0xPARC
The panel will be moderated by Nicholas Paul from The Long Now Foundation. 
Following the discussion, attendees can look forward to exclusive content, closing remarks, and a performance to conclude the event.
